name: Crippling Critical
text: You are able to maim a target and hinder its movement.
benefit: Whenever you score a critical hit against an opponent, its speed is halved for 1 minute. A successful Fortitude save reduces this duration to 1d4 rounds. The DC of this save is equal to 10 + your base attack bonus. Against creatures with multiple types of movement, you must choose which movement type to affect. A flying creature hit by this attack must make a DC 10 Fly check to remain airborne, and has its maneuverability reduced by one step.
special: You can only apply the effects of one critical feat to a given critical hit unless you possess Critical Mastery.
staminaText: When you confirm a critical hit and attempt to cripple an opponent with this feat, you can spend up to 5 stamina points to increase the DC of this feat’s saving throw by an amount equal to the number of stamina points you spent.
text_zh: 你能够让目标残废，使其运动受到阻碍。
benefit_zh: 当你成功对一名敌人造成重击时，他的速度会减半，持续1分钟。成功的强韧豁免能够使持续时间降低至1d4轮。该次豁免的DC等同于“10+你的BAB”。对于拥有多种移动类型的生物，你必须选择想要影响的移动类型。正在飞行的生物若被此攻击命中，则必须进行DC为10的飞行检定以保持滞留在空中，并且它的机动性会下降一级。
special_zh:
你只能将一种重击专长的效果应用到一次确认的重击上，除非你拥有“重击大师”专长。

【编注：本专长没有〔重击专长〕标签，这很诡异。】
staminaText_zh: 当你重击确认并尝试用该专长令目标减速时，通过花费最多不超过5点耐力，你可以提升豁免DC等同所耗费的耐力点。
